title: 20x Birthday Invitation Cards and Envelopes - Happy Birthday Fill-in 20 Envelopes-Light Weight 230 Gram Post Card Style Invites for Kids Party
features: ➤ HIGH QUALITY CARD STOCK: Our birthday invitations are printed on high quality card stock to ensure only the highest quality birthday party invitations for your special day!
➤ VIBRANT COLORS: Our birthday invitations have colorful design that your guests will love to receive!
➤ EASY TO FILL: Are you more of a pen or pencil person? Either way we got you covered! Our party invitations are super easy to fill with pencil, pen, marker, colored pencil and even a crayon!
➤ 20 INVITATIONS & ENVELOPES: Rest assured knowing you can invite ALL your friends to your upcoming celebrations with this value pack that includes 20 stylish invitation cards and envelopes.

➤ 100% SATISFACTION WARRANTY: Buy with confident knowing our birthday party invitations are thoughtfully made for you to celebrate your loved ones happy birthday in the best possible way. If for any reason you are less than 100% satisfied with the product, we will refund you the entire purchase price.
description: Happy birthday invitations is our specialty, that is why we consider it our mission to provide the best birthday decorations for the perfect happy birthday experience. All of our birthday party invitations are made thoughtfully with the highest quality card stock to ensure the best experience possible. We know it is not easy to plan the perfect celebration that is why we kept it simple for you, all you need to do is simply write your guests details, put the invitations in the envelopes and send them to all your loved ones!
